mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET is_attend=1 WHERE lecture_id=#{lecture_id} AND user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.is_attend, a.user_id, a.week, li.day_of_week, li.lecture_start, li.lecture_end FROM attendance a JOIN lecture_info li ON li.id=a.lecture_info_id WHERE li.lecture_id=#{lectureId} AND a.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance(user_id, week, lecture_info_id, created_at, modified_at, is_attend) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{week}, #{lecture_info_id}, default, default, 0);
